channel.title: Statistics on OWASP ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in Statistics on OWASP ZAP

item.title: Active Scan Rule Stats Last Month
item.description: This page shows the statistics for the top 30 (by alert count) Active Scan rules last month. You can sort on any column - just click on the column headers. For more details on what the stats mean see the blog post: Monthly Active Scan Rule Statistics Alert Status Alert Count False Positive % Average Time in Secs User Agent Fuzzer release 29020573 0.

item.title: Bar Charts
item.description: We measure and record a range of statistics related to ZAP, some of which are made public here. The blog post: Collecting Statistics for Open Source Projects explains how this all works. Check for Updates The number of Check for Update requests received per month. From 2.9.0 the suffix 'd' indicates ZAP is running as a daemon rather than the desktop.

item.title: Highest False Positives Last Month
item.description: These were the alerts most frequently flagged as false positives using Alert Filters last month. Note that this does not necessarily mean they are false positives, it could mean that the people using ZAP are not interested in these specific vulnerabilities. Position Alert Status Rule Type 1 Timestamp Disclosure release Passive 2 Information Disclosure - Suspicious Comments release Passive 3 Cookie No HttpOnly Flag release Passive 4 Cross-Domain Misconfiguration release Passive 5 X-Content-Type-Options Header Missing release Passive 6 User Agent Fuzzer release Active 7 Absence of Anti-CSRF Tokens release Passive 8 Loosely Scoped Cookie release Passive 9 Session ID in URL Rewrite release Passive 10 Re-examine Cache-control Directives release Passive 11 Retrieved from Cache release Passive 12 CSP release Passive 13 Anti-CSRF Tokens Check beta Active 14 Backup File Disclosure beta Active 15 Permissions Policy Header Not Set beta Passive 16 Anti-clickjacking Header release Passive 17 Content Security Policy (CSP) Header Not Set release Passive 18 PII Disclosure release Passive 19 Big Redirect Detected (Potential Sensitive Information Leak) release Passive 20 Strict-Transport-Security Header release Passive

item.title: Pie Charts
item.description: Some stats are shown for all pings and for desktop only pings. The desktop pings show a significantly different profile, possibly because many automated ZAP scans run in the cloud and many cloud providers are located in the USA. We also know that quite a few companies run ZAP as a SaaS offering which will also skew the stats.

item.title: Top ZAP Add-Ons Last Month
item.description: These were the most frequently installed optional add-ons last month. Note that this does not mean they were the most used add-ons - that is harder to quantify. Position Add-On Status Id Last Updated 1 Import/Export beta exim 2023-04-04 2 Requester beta requester 2023-03-23 3 Database alpha database 2022-10-27 4 Spider release spider 2023-02-23 5 Passive scanner rules (beta) beta pscanrulesBeta 2023-03-03 6 Active scanner rules (beta) beta ascanrulesBeta 2023-03-03 7 Access Control Testing alpha accessControl 2022-10-28 8 Port Scanner beta portscan 2022-10-27 9 Sequence alpha sequence 2021-10-07 10 Plug-n-Hack Configuration beta plugnhack 2022-10-27 11 Passive scanner rules (alpha) alpha pscanrulesAlpha 2023-03-03 12 Authentication Helper alpha authhelper 2023-03-13 13 Custom Payloads alpha custompayloads 2022-09-23 14 Active scanner rules (alpha) alpha ascanrulesAlpha 2022-12-13 15 Advanced SQLInjection Scanner beta sqliplugin 2021-10-20 16 Wappalyzer - Technology Detection release wappalyzer 2023-04-04 17 FuzzDB Files release fuzzdb 2022-09-23 18 Python Scripting beta jython 2021-10-07 19 Directory List v2.
